SEARCH
Module it.am04softeng.codexnaturalis
Package Client.View

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
Client.View.GUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UI
public class GUI extends Object implements UI
This class is responsible for the graphical user interface logic of the client side of the application.

  • Method Details

    • generateScene

      public void generateScene(String fxmlPath, SceneName sceneName, javafx.stage.Stage stage) throws IOException
      This method generates a scene from a fxml file, loads the scene controller , and adds the scene to the sceneMap and sceneControllerMap.
      Parameters:
      fxmlPath - the path of the fxml file
      sceneName - the name of the scene to generate
      stage - the stage where the scene will be displayed
      Throws:
      IOException - if the fxml file is not found

    • generateScenes

      public void generateScenes(javafx.stage.Stage stage) throws IOException
      This method generates all the scenes from a fxml file, loads the scene controller , and adds the scenes to the sceneMap and sceneControllerMap.
      Parameters:
      stage - the stage where the scene will be displayed
      Throws:
      IOException - if the fxml file is not found
